Articles.Content:
On EVA, lights are activated with L, but ship's lights are activated with "U". And because RCS Translation is controlled with IJKLNH, Pressing L will make Kerbal lights turn on in command seats.

So make the default light key for kerbals "U" instead of "L". Simple thing, would help n00bs.
This was always strange to me. I agree with the default being "U".
you can remap it - but yes, it should be default U, I agree.
The one corner case would be a kerbal in a command seat. Does his helmet toggle together with the craft lights? Should it?
Yes it should. U toggles all lights - and helmet lights are lights! But maybe you could add a switch to the seats RMB menu - "Activate helmet light toggle" or something.
